languages.text: "Ты действительно думал, что мы просто опустим головы перед Черным сердцем, Назракей? Тем самым, что попыталось избавиться от нас?" {n}Друкари издевательски склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Глупо было ожидать, что мы склонимся перед слабым, рассыпающимся от бремени лет трупом, не способным достойно переносить зов Сай'лантреш?"

traits.locale_text: "Ты действительно думал, что мы просто склоним головы перед Черным сердцем?" {n}Друкари издевательски склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Старым, рассыпающимся от бремени лет трупом, что избавляется от врагов чужими руками?"
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."
languages.original_text: "Ты действительно думал, что мы просто опустим головы перед Черным сердцем, Назракей? Тем самым, что попыталось избавиться от нас?" {n}Друкари издевательски склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Глупо было ожидать, что мы склонимся перед слабым, рассыпающимся от бремени лет трупом, не способным достойно переносить зов Сай'лантреш?"

traits.locale_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same one that tried to get rid of us?" {n}Drukhari mockingly tilts his head.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to bow to a crumbling corpse, falling apart from the burden of years. Unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same one that tried to get rid of us?" {n}Drukhari mockingly tilts his head.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to bow to a crumbling corpse, falling apart from the burden of years. Unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."
traits.speaker: Karael

traits.locale_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Dachtet Ihr wirklich, wir würden uns einfach vor dem Schwarzen Herzen verneigen, Nazrakhei? Derselben Kabale, die uns auslöschen wollte?" {n}Der Drukhari legt spöttisch den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Es war töricht, von uns zu erwarten, dass wir vor einer schwachen Leiche buckeln, die unter der Last von Jahren zerfällt, unfähig, den Ruf von Sai'lanthresh würdevoll zu ertragen."
languages.original_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Dachtet Ihr wirklich, wir würden uns einfach vor dem Schwarzen Herzen verneigen, Nazrakhei? Derselben Kabale, die uns auslöschen wollte?" {n}Der Drukhari legt spöttisch den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Es war töricht, von uns zu erwarten, dass wir vor einer schwachen Leiche buckeln, die unter der Last von Jahren zerfällt, unfähig, den Ruf von Sai'lanthresh würdevoll zu ertragen."
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: “你真的以为我们会在黑心阴谋团面前卑躬屈膝吗，纳札骸？你想除掉我们，你以为我们真的会屈从吗？”{n}卡瑞尔嘲弄地歪着头。{/n}“你居然指望我们在一具虚弱的尸体面前卑躬屈膝？何等愚蠢。这句尸体已经在岁月的重压下摇摇欲坠，甚至无法庄严地面对赛·兰斯雷什的召唤。”
languages.original_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."

traits.locale_text: “你真的以为我们会在黑心阴谋团面前卑躬屈膝吗，纳札骸？你想除掉我们，你以为我们真的会屈从吗？”{n}卡瑞尔嘲弄地歪着头。{/n}“你居然指望我们在一具虚弱的尸体面前卑躬屈膝？何等愚蠢。这句尸体已经在岁月的重压下摇摇欲坠，甚至无法庄严地面对赛·兰斯雷什的召唤。”
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: « Pensiez-vous vraiment que nous courberions l'échine devant le Cœur Noir, Nazrakhei ? La Kabale qui a tenté de nous éliminer ? » {n}Le Drukhari penche la tête, feignant l'intérêt.{/n} « Quelle stupidité, de nous imaginer capituler devant un frêle cadavre qui croule sous le poids des années, incapable de résister dignement à l'appel de Sai'lanthresh. »
languages.original_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."

traits.locale_text: « Pensiez-vous vraiment que nous courberions l'échine devant le Cœur Noir, Nazrakhei ? La Kabale qui a tenté de nous éliminer ? » {n}Le Drukhari penche la tête, feignant l'intérêt.{/n} « Quelle stupidité, de nous imaginer capituler devant un frêle cadavre qui croule sous le poids des années, incapable de résister dignement à l'appel de Sai'lanthresh. »
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: «¿Pero tú te creías que íbamos a postrarnos ante el Corazón Negro, Nazrakhei? ¿Ante la misma Kábala que intentó eliminarnos?». {n}El Drukhari ladea la cabeza burlonamente.{/n} «No tenía sentido esperar que nos arrastráramos ante un cadáver débil, que se desmorona con el peso de los años y que es incapaz de soportar la llamada de Sai'lanthresh con dignidad».
languages.original_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pero tú te creías que íbamos a postrarnos ante el Corazón Negro, Nazrakhei? ¿Ante la misma Kábala que intentó eliminarnos?». {n}El Drukhari ladea la cabeza burlonamente.{/n} «No tenía sentido esperar que nos arrastráramos ante un cadáver débil, que se desmorona con el peso de los años y que es incapaz de soportar la llamada de Sai'lanthresh con dignidad».
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: 「我々が黒き心臓の前でただ頭を垂れると本当に思ったのか、ナズラクヘイ？我々を始末しようとした陰謀団に？」{n}デュカーリはあざけるように首をかしげる。{/n}「何年もの苦境のなかで身を削り、セランスレッシュの呼びかけに冷静に耐えることもできない軟弱な屍に、我々が平伏すなどと考えるのは、愚かなことだ」
languages.original_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."

traits.locale_text: 「我々が黒き心臓の前でただ頭を垂れると本当に思ったのか、ナズラクヘイ？我々を始末しようとした陰謀団に？」{n}デュカーリはあざけるように首をかしげる。{/n}「何年もの苦境のなかで身を削り、セランスレッシュの呼びかけに冷静に耐えることもできない軟弱な屍に、我々が平伏すなどと考えるのは、愚かなことだ」
traits.speaker: Karael

languages.text: "Gerçekten Kara Yürek'e, bizi doğrudan yok etmeye çalışan Kabal'a boyun eğeceğimizi mi düşündün Nazrakhei?" {n}Drukhari, alaycı bir edayla başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Omuzlarına binen yükün altında ezilmiş, Sai'lanthresh'in çağrısına şerefiyle direnmeyi başaramamış, dermanı kalmamış bir cesedin önünde yere kapanmamızı beklemen aptallık."
languages.original_text: "Did you really think we would just bow before the Black Heart, Nazrakhei? The same Kabal that tried to dispose of us?" {n}The Drukhari tilts his head mockingly.{/n} "It was foolish to expect us to grovel before a feeble corpse, crumbling under the burden of years, unable to endure the call of Sai'lanthresh with dignity."

traits.locale_text: "Kara Yürek'ün karşısında boyun eğeceğimizi mi düşündün gerçekten Nazrakhei? Direkt bizi yok etmeye çalışan Kabal'a?" {n}Drukhari alaycı bir edayla başını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Yılların omuzlarına bindirdiği yükün altında ezilmiş, Sai'lanthresh'in çağrısına şerefiyle direnmeyi başaramamış, dermanı kalmamış bir cesedin önünde yere kapanmamızı beklemen aptalcaydı."
traits.speaker: Karael
